articles.title: S. Korean "Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade" Accused of Its Anti-DPRK Campaign
articles.content:
S. Korean "Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade" Accused of Its Anti-DPRK Campaign
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement on Monday in which he said that as long as such group of pro-American lackeys as the "Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade" of south Korea is allowed to stay in offices, it is impossible to prevent the inter-Korean relations from being further deteriorated and a war from breaking out on the Korean Peninsula to turn south Korea into a sea of fire and to debris. 
					The statement continued:
					
					 When the DPRK vehemently turned down the UNSC's "presidential statement" and took strong measures against it, the "ministry" and other institutions of the puppet authorities of south Korea, in league with the United States and Japan, called for "appropriate steps" and "sanctions" against the DPRK while terming those steps "a challenge to the international community." And they are blustering that south Korea remains unchanged in the principle calling for the full participation in the PSI.
					
					 The above-said "ministry" has even the issues related to the inter-Korean relations under its thumb, exercising full mandate in the matters of diplomacy, security and unification, and working with bloodshot eyes to make them serve the purposes of foreign forces' confrontation with the DPRK and their war policy under the signboard of "priority to the U.S.-south Korea alliance." 
					
					 It is none other than the "ministry" that totally torpedoed the process of denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula in collusion with its U.S. and Japanese masters. It is again the "ministry" that has conducted a campaign against the inter-Korean joint declarations and staged a vicious "human rights" farce against the DPRK even in the international arena and persistently insisted on south Korea's full participation in the extremely dangerous PSI.
					
					 Mandarins of the "ministry" went the lengths of impudently interfering in the issue of the Kaesong Industrial Zone. They did not hesitate to make reckless remarks that they would bring to the UN Human Rights Council the case of the person who is now under investigation after being arrested while hatching anti-DPRK plots.
					
					 It is preposterous for those wholly responsible for the torpedoed process of denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula to talk about the "denuclearization." Raising it as a precondition for improving the inter-Korean relations is, in the final analysis, nothing but rhetoric intended to completely sever the inter-Korean relations, denying dialogue and cooperation, and disarm the DPRK in a bid to ignite a war of aggression against it.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group had better come to its senses and stop adding to the crimes committed against the nation through such machines as the "ministry", a tool of the U.S. and its war servant.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Producing and Showing "Anti-Communist" Films and TV Dramas
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Producing and Showing "Anti-Communist" Films and TV Dramas
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- "Anti-communist" movies and TV dramas are now being massively produced and shown in south Korea to defile the dignified system in the DPRK and incite antipathy and confrontation between the north and the south. And even foreign films seriously misrepresenting the reality of the DPRK are openly shown there. 
					 A spokesman for the Literature and Art Sub-committee of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in a statement issued Tuesday said: 
					
					 This is an indication that the vicious and dastardly moves of the group of traitors to completely stamp out the idea of "By our nation itself" which has dynamically advanced the June 15 era in the sphere of literature and art of south Korea and benumb the south Koreans' thoughts have reached an extreme phase.
					
					 The Lee group is staging such farce as reproducing the above-said cheap films and TV dramas which were washed away by the strong trend of the June 15 era after being censured and rejected as garbage of history in south Korea in a bid to prop up the unpopular pro-U.S. conservative "government" and bring under control the situation in which it is driven into a crisis at home and abroad. This is, however, a serious miscalculation. 
					
					 The people's sound thinking and morality cannot but be ruthlessly violated and the north-south relations can never be improved as long as sycophancy towards the U.S. is justified, fascists are allowed to ride roughshod and confrontation with fellow countrymen is incited in south Korea.
					
					 The Lee group is sadly mistaken if it thinks it can quell the just and patriotic thinking of the south Korean people desirous of national unity and reunification with chains of fascism. 
					
					 The Lee group had better stop its rash acts and immediately halt its despicable smear campaign inciting north-south confrontation, well aware of the miserable end met by those who swam against the trend of the times.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Cameroon
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Cameroon
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Paul Biya, President of Cameroon, on the occasion of the 37th founding anniversary of the Republic of Cameroon. 
					 Kim in the message wished the President success in his work for national unity and social stability.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the friendship delegation of the China Association for International Friendly Contact on a visit to the DPRK.
					 It was handed to an official concerned by Vice Secretary General of the association Song Enlei who is head of the delegation.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Back
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Back
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation headed by Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun came back home today after participating in the ministerial meeting of the Coordinating Committee of Non-aligned Movement held in Cuba. 
					 The delegation visited Cuba, Peru and Brazil as the government delegation of the DPRK.

articles.title: Norwegian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Norwegian Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Norway arrived here Tuesday by air.

articles.title: Treasure-Book for Health and Longevity
articles.content:
Treasure-Book for Health and Longevity
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The book "Library of Korean Naturopathic Resources in Korea" has been brought out in the DPRK, which is conducive to the health promotion and longevity of people.
					 The book, which consists of three volumes, deals with the historical summary of mineral spring and peloid resources of the country and their characters, positions of regional mineral spring resources and data on analysis and research of their ingredients, hygienic and longevous valuation of treatment resources by mountain spring water and characters, seasonal and regional characters of the Korean climate, selection of climatic sanatorium and rest resorts according to the characters of climatotherapy resources and their medical valuation and so on.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung saw to it that sanatoriums and rest homes were built at beauty spots of the country from many years ago, saying that the precious nature-cure resources should be analyzed and studied in an overall way and made an effective use of as essential means for the prevention and treatment of diseases of the people and for their long life in health.
					
					 True to the lofty will of the President, scientists have made indefatigable efforts to find treatment resources by mineral spring and mud baths, treatment resources by mountain spring water and the treatment resources by climate and scenic beauty in hundreds of places across the country and systematized their physicochemical, pharmacological and clinical research success in a comprehensive way for tens of years.

articles.title: Taffy, Korean National Food
articles.content:
Taffy, Korean National Food
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Taffy is a favorite sweet food of the Korean people. An old record said that it is made by the method of fermenting with malt and boiling down powder of polished rice, polished glutinous rice, kaoliang, maize and so on.
					 There are three kinds of taffies--glucose (jochong), black taffy and white taffy. Glucose is made by the method of fermenting the materials with malt, black taffy by the method of boiling down and cooling glucose and white taffy by the method of extending the black taffy repeatedly. 
					
					 In order to give a flavor to taffy, it is coated with various materials such as sesame, pine nuts, walnut, black pepper, cinnamon, powdered ginger, pounded jujube.
					
					 According to coating materials, taffy is called jujube taffy, chestnut taffy, walnut taffy, bean taffy and sesame taffy and so on.
					
					 The glucose is used for processing dishes and making medicines and black taffy is mainly taken as a snack.
					
					 The taffy mixed with cinnamon, dried ginger, agarophyte, Japanese apricot and the like is used as expectorant.
					
					 Taffy is not so sweet but tasty and nutritive.
					
					 It had been well-known to foreign countries as a special food from olden times.
					
					 Now the Korean people are making taffy with potato and other materials.

articles.title: Wonder of Mt. Paektu Acclaiming Its Master
articles.content:
Wonder of Mt. Paektu Acclaiming Its Master
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il went to Ryanggang Province in the spring of Juche 61 (1972) to guide on the spot the preparations for the events of the 35th anniversary of the historic victory in the Pochonbo Battle. In the morning one day he said he would like to climb Mt. Paektu.
					Utterly nonplussed, the officials tried to persuade him to postpone it a few days at least because of bad weather.
					
					He told them that one could say he saw real Mt. Paektu, understand the mettle of Mt. Paektu and get grasps on the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu only when he climbed the mountain in blizzards and set out on the trip to the mountain with them.
					
					When the party escorting him got to Taeyonji Peak, the snowstorm of Mt. Paektu began to assault them.
					
					The howling snowstorm made it difficult to see an inch ahead and the raging wind carried mountains of snow in a twinkle, blocking the way. 
					
					Again the officials told him it seemed impossible to go up further.
					
					Saying with a hearty laughter that a real march was just beginning then, he cut through the snow at the head.
					
					Fighting the way through the maddening wind, snowstorm and snowdrift, the party managed to reach the top of Mt. Paektu at last.
					
					When Kim Jong Il was looking around, with his arms akimbo, a thunderous sound of ice breaking came from Lake Chon all of a sudden and the frantic blizzards began to subside.
					
					The clouds slowly moved away, revealing the blue sky and the sun threw its bright rays. Peaks of the mountain shone dazzlingly in the sunshine.
					
					It was really a grand snow-covered scene of Mt. Paektu.
					
					"Mt. Paektu opened its gate to its master and revealed its gigantic and graceful sight. What a wonder of Mt. Paektu!" shouted the officials to themselves in solemn feelings, fascinated by the mysterious scene.

articles.title: U.S. Moves to Work out New Strategy towards DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Moves to Work out New Strategy towards DPRK under Fire
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- U.S. influential think tanks,  experts in the Korean issue and policy executors are reported to be busy working out a new strategy towards the DPRK. They are blustering that the DPRK should "respect" the "presidential statement" of the UN Security Council and opt for implementing it, asserting that they would not yield to its "surprise act" but apply additional sanctions against it.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is nothing but an artifice to pass the buck for the strained situation to the DPRK as it is a revelation of the high-handed policy of strength pursued by the U.S. accustomed to pressurizing and dictating others.
					
					 The U.S. should apologize for having reneged on the already agreed commitments and made a serious mockery of the sovereignty of the DPRK before talking about what it called "dialogue," the commentary urges, and goes on:
					
					 For the U.S. to pressurize the DPRK without fulfilling its commitments would only make the situation more complicated.
					
					 The U.S. is going so foolish as to try to attain its criminal aim by applying additional sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 A scrutiny into what has happened so far since the emergence of the Obama Administration in the U.S. indicates that its hostile policy towards the DPRK is little different from what it used to be in the past and it is being further stepped up in a more cunning manner.
					
					 The U.S. warlike forces have singled out a pre-emptive nuclear attack on the DPRK as part of its scenario for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 It admits of no argument that the DPRK will take decisive measures to bolster up its nuclear deterrent under the uplifted banner of Songun as the U.S. increases the threat to infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK while escalating the moves to stifle it. These measures will surely prove effective in checking those moves of the U.S. and ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Japan's Scenario for Preemptive Attack on DPRK Flayed
articles.content:
Japan's Scenario for Preemptive Attack on DPRK Flayed
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Japan was reported to contemplate pushing ahead with an examination of the proposal to expand the scope of the "Self-Defense Forces'" use of weapons for the purpose of "defending its territorial air" in the "defence programme guidelines" to be revised late this year.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The aim sought by Japan is to allow the SDF to use weapons in its territorial air and thus "intercept" satellites or missiles to be launched by the DPRK in the future. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the Japanese reactionaries are seeking to introduce an early warning satellite as its countermeasure against the DPRK's satellite launch and bolster up the missile defence system. 
					
					 These developments in Japan go to prove that the Japanese reactionaries remain unchanged in their scenario to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK in a bid to realize the reinvasion of Korea at any cost and this has reached a danger level.
					
					 Japan has disclosed its undisguised ambition to make a preemptive strike at the DPRK after gradually escalating the moves to turn it into a military power under the pretext of "missile threat" from the DPRK. This is nothing but a folly of those who know nothing of the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to stop acting rashly, well aware of the DPRK's capability for making its own style preemptive strike as it is always ready to deal decisive and merciless blows at any aggressors with the unpredictable tremendous military force.
					
					 If Japan dares preempt an attack on the DPRK, its army and people will finally settle accounts with Japan, their sworn enemy.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Pro- Reunification Patriotic Forces Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Pro- Reunification Patriotic Forces Flayed
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Of late the south Korean police authorities applied for warrants of arrest for three leading members of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) and three leading members of the North Chungchong Provincial Branch of the south Korean Federation of Peasants' Associations who had been walked off to police stations on charges of violation of the "National Security Law". Earlier, they conducted a search, seizure and arrest operation against three students of Ajou University for the mere reason that they presented reunification-related papers on the theme of "Songun policy and army-people unity" to an academic seminar sponsored by a civic and social organization. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Such action taken by the Lee Myung Bak group is a high-handed tyrannical action to hold in check the patriotic advance of the people and stem the trend of the movement for achieving reunification through an alliance with the north in south Korea and, at the same time, wantonly violate democracy and human rights and establish a fascist dictatorial system. 
					
					It goes on:
					
					 The above-said members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon who became targets of the recent suppression have done nothing to be accused. 
					
					 The campaign of arrest and detention launched by the south Korean fascist authorities, finding fault with the activities of the patriotic figures and youth and students, is aimed at destroying the mainstay of the pro-reunification patriotic forces in south Korea in a bid to scuttle the movements for independence, democracy and national reunification and ensure the stability of their power by establishing the fascist dictatorial system under the signboard of "pragmatism."
					
					 The reality proves that the Lee group is, indeed, the enemy of the nation and a ferocious group of dictators hell-bent on confrontation with fellow countrymen and suppression as they are stepping up the fascistization of society, violating not only the freedom of activities of the patriotic organizations and people from all walks of life desirous of national unity and reunification but the freedom of thinking and writing activities, the universally recognized human rights.
					
					 Tyrannical nature and brutality are an expression of vulnerability and the days of the fascist dictatorship and tyrannical policy are numbered. 
					
					 The Lee group is fated to meet a stern judgment of history as it has turned the south Korean society into the darkest one under fascism by quelling the desire and wishes of the people for independence, democracy and reunification through fascist dictatorship.

articles.title: Abrogation of NSL in S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
Abrogation of NSL in S. Korea Demanded
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- South Korea has turned into a land where Lee Myung Bak's fascist dictatorship is rampant under the signboard of "pragmatism." This reality raises the repeal of the fascist "National Security Law (NSL)" more urgent than ever before.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The NSL is the most reactionary law as it tramples down the sovereignty and dignity of the south Korean people and their freedom and rights and blocks the reconciliation and unity between the north and the south and national reunification.
					
					 The history of the NSL is a history of bloodshed as it has put down the righteous struggle of the south Korean people for independence, democracy and reunification, a crime-woven history as it has zealously backed the colonial fascist rule and a history of treachery as it helped build high the barrier of division while escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 In fact, south Korea has turned into the worst land ridden with fascist rampage and a tundra of human rights in the world where the people's elementary democratic freedom and rights are mercilessly violated due to the NSL.
					
					 The organizations and patriotic people calling for dialogue, cooperation between the north and the south and national reunification are being indiscriminately punished and trials and difficulties are lying in the way of the movement for national reunification due to this evil law rejecting the dialogue partner and denying the north-south dialogue itself.
					
					 The anachronistic NSL should be abolished without delay as it blocks the independent and democratic development of the south Korean society and gravely challenges the cause of national reunification.
					
					 If the Lee Myung Bak group persistently seeks to stay in power and escalates confrontation with fellow countrymen on the strength of the fascist law quite contrary to the call of the times for the abolition of the NSL, it will stand more bitterly cursed and denounced by all the Koreans and find itself in the dumping ground of history in the end along with the fascist law.

articles.title: Anti-"Government" Actions Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"Government" Actions Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Actions of south Korean people of different strata were staged in Kwangju on May 17 to condemn traitor Lee Myung Bak for his crimes committed against the nation, people and reunification on the occasion of the 29th anniversary of the May 18 Kwangju popular uprising. 
					 A rally was held in the area of Kumnam Street by members of civic and public organizations including the Solidarity for Progress, the Kwangju and South Jolla Provincial Solidarity for Progress, the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Federation of Peasants Associations and the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Ri Kang Sil, permanent co-chairperson of the south Korean Solidarity for Progress, declared the horrible massacre committed in Kwangju 29 years ago is repeating itself under the Lee Myung Bak regime, adding that the only way of putting the present situation under control is for all people to pool efforts and fight against the regime. 
					
					 Pan Myong Ja, vice-chairperson of the Confederation of Trade Unions, said that when the people and progressive forces fail to go united, it is impossible to achieve victory, calling upon all progressive forces to struggle in unity. 
					
					 Ri Thae Hyong, member of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), stated that the suppression of the reunification movement forces, the tragedy in Ryongsan and other happenings were by no means accidental but an inevitable product of the present regime's anti- reunification, undemocratic and unpopular policy.  
					
					 Ju Pyong Jun, chairman of the People's Measure Committee for Opposing the Expansion of the Drill Ground in Mugon-ri, vowed to struggle at the risk of his life in the same spirit as displayed by the participants of the Kwangju uprising and thus defend their native village. 
					
					 A resolution read out there called on the people of different strata to frustrate the moves of the conservative ruling forces to drive the people to misery, revive dictatorship and perpetuate the national split and build a new society, independent, democratic and reunified, through a solidarity struggle to force the Lee regime to step down. 
					
					 Prior to the rally, students staged an art performance representing the struggle of the participants in the May 18 Kwangju uprising. 
					
					 There was in the city of Kwangju a May 18 grand march for independent reunification to inherit the spirit of Kwangju resistance fighters, put an end to the suppression under the pretext of "security"  and demand the resignation of the Lee Myung Bak regime. 
					
					 Participating in it were members of civic and public organizations grouping people of different strata including the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, workers, peasants, youth and students, middle and high schoolers, housewives pushing baby carriages, netizens and other people of different strata. 
					
					 "A memorial service for commemorating the 29th anniversary of the May 18 popular uprising" took place in Kwangju on the same day.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Unpopular Policy Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Unpopular Policy Protested in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- More than 10,000 workers from different parts of south Korea held a rally in Taejon on May 16 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its unjust labor policy on the occasion of the 29th anniversary of the May 18 Kwangju popular uprising. 
					 Speakers at the rally declared they could never forget the desire of the participants in the May 18 Kwangju uprising brutally killed by the fascist military dictators 29 years ago. 
					
					 Referring to the fact that Pak Jong Thae, chairman of the Kwangju branch of the Freight Workers' Solidarity, committed suicide in protest against the unwarranted action taken by the management side to dismiss workers en masse, they stated it was none other than Lee and big businesses that drove him to death. 
					
					 Noting that the death of Pak Jong Thae was by no means in vain, they declared that workers from different parts of south Korea would turn out as one in the actions to gain the right to work and surely emerge victorious in the struggle against the Lee regime. 
					
					 In another development, the solidarity called a general strike on the same day.
					
					 Noting that the solidarity would never allow any act to suppress the general strike but launch a full-dressed struggle against it, the organization declared it would call on the members of the trade unions in all fields including construction, railway, harbor, gas and electricity to launch a solidarity struggle. 
					
					 Members of the solidarity marched along streets of Taejon in demand of an end to the unpopular labor policy.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- A Bangladesh national preparatory committee was inaugurated on May 13 to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at its inaugural ceremony.
					
					 The preparatory committee discussed on organizing a joint seminar on the greatness and leadership exploits of the President, a film show, a photo exhibition and other colorful events.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia campana de confrontacion con RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia campana de confrontacion con RPDC
Pyongyang, 19 de mayo (ATCC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica la vispera una declaracion en la cual senalaron que mientras existen el "Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y de Comercio" y otros traidores proyanquis del Sur de Corea, no puede eludir el creciente empeoramiento de las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea ni el estallido de la guerra ni tampoco la conversion del Sur de Corea en un mar de fuego y  en monton de cenizas y continuaron:
					  En estos dias, el "Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y de Comercio" y las autoridades titeres surcoreanas, al cuestionar el rechazamiento rotundo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sobre la "declaracion presidencial" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y las poderosas contramedidas de aquella al respecto, lo califican de "desafio a la sociedad internacional" e insisten en aplicarle la "sancion", en colaboracion con Estados Unidos y Japon, por una parte y por la otra hablan de que "no hay cambio en el principio de participacion total del Sur de Corea en la iniciativa de no proliferacion de las armas de extermino masivo".
					
					  Bajo el rotulo de dar la "preferencia a las relaciones de la alianza Sur de Corea-EE.UU.", susodicho "ministerio" surcoreano controla las ramas de la diplomacia, la seguridad y la reunificacion, maneja a su antojo hasta las relaciones intercoreanas y actua con ojos inyectados de sangre para convertirlas en una cosa  dependiente de las maniobras de confrontacion anti-RPDC de las fuerzas extranjeras y de la politica de la guerra.
					
					   Tambien, destruyo totalmente el proceso de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana en contubernio con los amos norteamericano y japones, arma en la escena internacional el alboroto contra la declaracion conjunta Norte-Sur, recurre a la farsa  intrigante de "DDHH" contra la RPDC e insiste tercamente en la participacion total en la extremadamente peligrosa "iniciativa de no proliferacion de las armas de exterminio masivo".
					
					  E incluso, al entremeterse hasta en el asunto de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong, no vacila soltar el disparate de que presentaria ante el Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU el problema de un tipejo quien esta sometido a la averiguacion tras ser arrestado por sus actos intrigantes contra la RPDC.
					
					  Los fautores, que llevaron al fracaso la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana, hablan  tanto de la supuesta "desnuclearizacion", lo cual es una absurdidad. Tomar la "desnuclearizacion" por premisa de las relaciones N-S significa, en fin de cuentas, la negacion al dialogo y la cooperacion, el rompimiento total de estas relaciones y la provocacion de la guerra contra el Norte de Corea luego de desarmarlo.
					
					  La banda de Lee Myung Bak, con su propia cabeza, debe abstenerse de acumular las culpas ante la nacion siguiendo al "Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y de Comercio", sirviente de EE.UU. y  acolito de la guerra.

articles.title: Comite preparatorio de Bangladesh para efemeride coreana
articles.content:
Comite preparatorio de Bangladesh para efemeride coreana
  Pyongyang, 19 de mayo (ATCC) -- Quedo constituido el dia 13 el comite preparatorio nacional de Bangladesh para el centenario (15 de abril de 2012) del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					  Como presidente del comite naciente fue electo el presidente del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Bangladesh, Rashed Khan Menon.
					
					  La entidad decidio organizar el simposio conjunto sobre la noble personalidad y hazanas de direccion del Presidente, la proyeccion filmica, la fotoexhibicion y otras diversas actividades.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de delegacion china
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de delegacion china
  Pyongyang, 19 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dirigiera la delegacion de amistad de la Asociacion de Enlace de Amistad Internacional de China, de visita en Corea.
					  El jefe de la delegacion Song Enlei, subsecretario general de dicha asociacion, lo entrego a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Yot, alimento tradicional de Corea
articles.content:
Yot, alimento tradicional de Corea
Pyongyang, 19 de mayo (ATCC) -- Yot (parecido al turron) es el dulce tradicional de la nacion coreana que se prepara con la harina de cereales fermentada echando la malta.
					  Segun datos historicos, se usaban como sus ingredientes principales el arroz blanco y el glutinoso, la zahina, el maiz, etc.
					
					 El Yot no condensado se llama "Jochong" y el condensado, fermentado y solidificado, "Hukdang". Y se le dice "Paekdang" al Yot estirado de color blanco. 
					
					  Para fomentar su sabor, se le agregan por el borde el sesamo, pinon, nuez, pimienta, canela, polvo de jengibre secado, azufaifa y otras sustancias.
					
					 Su nombre varia tambien segun estos ingredientes secundarios.
					
					 El Jochong se usa en la cocina y la farmacologia y el Hukdang, como merienda.
					
					  El Kyekangyot hecho con canela, jengibre seco, Gelidium amansii, fruto de endrino y otros materiales es excelente reconstituyente que funciona tambien como antidoto de flema.
					
					  Es muy conocido tambien en otros paises el Yot, que se consumia en mucha cantidad en la vida alimentaria del pueblo coreano.
					
					  Hoy, los coreanos preparan ese alimento con otros ingredientes como la patata.
